prompt_variants.variant_name: Primary - MATHEMATICS FULLY BREAKING - HOUSE BIGGER INSIDE 8 SECONDS
prompt_variants.subject: Camera dollying through house interior revealing impossible truth - the inside is larger than outside, rooms that shouldn't exist, distances that don't match, the family in multiple places simultaneously.
prompt_variants.action: DOLLY BEGINS at door. Move through main room - 12Ã—16 feet. But dolly continues past where wall should be. Into second room that can't exist. Same family there too - eating at identical table. Continue dolly. Third room. Family again, sleeping. Fourth room. Family as sheep, standing. All simultaneous. All true. DOLLY TURNS, returns. But path different. Room with family as children. Room with them elderly. Room with them dead. All 12Ã—16 feet. All the same room. All different. Finally returns to original - family frozen, aware something wrong. MagnÃºs counts rooms on fingers: "En, to, tre..." Gets different number each count. GuÃ°rÃºn sees but says nothing. Children playing as if normal. Only Sigrid speaks: "HÃºsiÃ° er stÃ¦rra innan" (The house is bigger inside). Because they're inside giant's body. Internal space doesn't follow external rules. Mathematics broken completely.
